files.README.md:
# PACT

See docs/README.md for authoritative project documentation.
files.scripts/README.md:
# Scripts

This directory contains only structure and validation scripts.

No build, run, or install scripts belong here.
files.structure/README.md:
# Structure Definition

This directory defines the authoritative filesystem structure for the PACT repository.

The pact.structure.json file is the single source of truth.
